column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I'm not a big steakhouse person
column2: but this is the best steakhouse I've ever eaten at in my life and one of the best meals of my life (also probably the most calories). This is one of those places where you marvel that literally everything is done perfectly. I've had the garlic shrimp appetizer
column6: corn...I'm not sure what they put on that ribeye but it's an incredibly flavorful spice.
